description: This file contains CSS styles for theming and layout management of the App component in a Tic Tac Toe frontend.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class styling with background and text color configurations.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo with animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the application header section, includes layout and color configurations.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links in the application, with transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning and hover effects.
